exercises.name: Day 1: Explosive Push-Ups
exercises.description: Focus on pushing the ground explosively as if mimicking a blast movement.

setup: Start in a standard push-up position with hands slightly wider than shoulders
Keep your core tight and body in a straight line
Look slightly ahead of your hands for proper neck alignment
execution: Lower your body with control until chest nearly touches the ground
Explosively push up with maximum force
Allow your hands to leave the ground for advanced variations
Land softly and immediately prepare for the next rep
commonMistakes: Landing too hard after explosive push
instructions.breathingPattern: Inhale during lowering, forcefully exhale during explosive push

progression.advanced: 5 x 12 reps with clap or lateral jumps

exercises.name: Day 1: Dips (Parallel Bars)
exercises.description: Keep a controlled descent and explosive rise.

setup: Grip parallel bars with hands shoulder-width apart
Keep shoulders down and back
Start with arms fully extended
Cross ankles behind you for stability
execution: Lower body with control, keeping elbows close to body
Descend until upper arms are parallel to ground
Push explosively back to starting position
Maintain slight forward lean for chest emphasis
instructions.breathingPattern: Inhale during descent, exhale forcefully during push

progression.advanced: 5 x 12 reps (with a pause at the bottom)

exercises.name: Day 1: Advanced Shadowboxing Combos
exercises.description: Jab, cross, hook, kick feint, spinning elbow. Simulate real opponents, moving aggressively and defensively.

setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hands up in guard position
Keep knees slightly bent and weight evenly distributed
Focus on quick, precise movements
execution: Throw combinations of punches and kicks, moving around the room
Emphasize speed, agility, and reaction time
Mix up your combinations and footwork patterns
Maintain proper form throughout
instructions.breathingPattern: Sharp exhale with each strike, maintain steady breathing during movement

exercises.name: Day 1: Explosive Striking with Tire Flip
exercises.description: Combine explosive tire flips with striking combinations.

setup: Position yourself in front of a heavy tire
Adopt proper lifting stance
Keep core engaged and back straight
execution: Flip tire explosively
Immediately throw a combination
Return to tire flip position
Maintain high intensity throughout
instructions.breathingPattern: Explosive exhale during flip, rhythmic breathing during strikes

exercises.name: Day 2: Heavy Bag Power Combinations
exercises.description: Focus on maximum power output with each strike while maintaining technical precision.

setup: Position yourself at optimal striking distance
Maintain proper stance and guard
Check bag stability and padding
execution: Throw power combinations with full rotation
Mix up high and low strikes
Use proper footwork between combinations
Focus on follow-through with each strike
instructions.breathingPattern: Sharp exhale with each strike, controlled breathing between combinations

exercises.name: Day 2: Medicine Ball Slams
exercises.description: Explosive full-body movement focusing on power generation and core stability.

setup: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Hold medicine ball at chest height
Maintain athletic stance
execution: Raise ball overhead with explosive movement
Slam ball to ground with maximum force
Catch ball on bounce or pickup
Immediately transition to next rep
instructions.breathingPattern: Inhale during lift, forceful exhale during slam

exercises.name: Day 3: Plyometric Box Jumps
exercises.description: Explosive jumping exercises to develop lower body power and coordination.

setup: Position yourself in front of appropriate height box
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Maintain athletic stance
execution: Drop into quarter squat position
Jump explosively onto box
Land softly with bent knees
Step down carefully and reset
instructions.breathingPattern: Inhale during setup, explosive exhale during jump

exercises.name: Day 3: Tire Slammed Sit-Ups
exercises.description: Core-focused exercise combining traditional sit-ups with explosive tire strikes.

setup: Lie on back with knees bent
Position tire at arms reach above head
Keep lower back pressed to ground
execution: Perform explosive sit-up
Strike tire at top of movement
Control descent to starting position
Maintain core tension throughout
instructions.breathingPattern: Inhale during descent, explosive exhale during strike
